name: Bread Hunter (Demo)
description:
Bread Hunter

Explore the world of bread as a heroic slice trying to save his girlfriend from the evil Baguette.

Features:

  • 5 painstakingly difficult levels to try
  • A wonder filled world ran by bread.
  • Music composed by Xaxbyu
  • So much carbs, you'll be obese by the time you finish the game.

If that sounds fabulous to you, click the download below, and begin your adventure through the world of bread. Prepare your vocabulary of curse words, because you will need it. ( or not. It really depends on the type of person you are)
